# Coment, should not parse!
#127.0.0.1	localhost,localhost.localdomain
127.0.0.1	localhost
::1	localhost ip6-localhost ip6-loopback
fe00::	ip6-localnet
ff00::	ip6-mcastprefix
ff02::1	ip6-allnodes
ff02::2	ip6-allrouters
172.17.0.2	c8d645833a8c
192.18.1.1  tesst# some comment
0.1 # bad line
127.0.0.1 No.Where.Com# should not parse here
127.0.0.2 No.Where.Com# should not parse here
127.0.0.3 No.Where.Com# should not parse here
::1 No.Where.Com# should not parse here
::2 No.Where.Com# should not parse here
::3 No.Where.Com# should not parse here
